text: Chet Thomas Holmgren (born May 1, 2002) is an American professional basketball player. He plays for the Oklahoma City Thunder in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He is 7 feet and 1 inch tall, making him the tallest player on the Thunder. He plays center and power forward positions. == References == Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Oklahoma City Thunder players Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Minneapolis
title: Chet Holmgren
